channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 2023年中国住宅丧失抵押品赎回权将增加43%
item.description: The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery.翻译:周一的一项私人调查显示，2023年中国止赎房屋数量同比增长43%，突显出在房地产市场持续低迷和经济复苏不平衡的情况下，抵押贷款拖欠率上升的令人担忧的趋势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管经济放缓，北京仍提高了2024年的增长目标
item.description: China's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy.翻译:尽管国民经济增长预期放缓，但中国首都北京仍设定了2024年5%左右的增长目标，超过了去年4.5%以上的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在漫画中警告其稀土面临“海外”威胁
item.description: China's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations".翻译:中国首席情报机构在社交媒体上发布了一幅连环漫画，其中有外国角色秘密开采稀土，故事描绘了中国的战略金属受到贪婪的“海外组织”的威胁。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 德国12月对美国和中国的出口大幅下降
item.description: Exports to Germany's most important overseas trade partners, including the United States and China, fell significantly at the end of last year, according to statistics office data on Monday.翻译:根据统计局周一的数据，去年年底，德国对美国和中国等最重要的海外贸易伙伴的出口大幅下降。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 碧桂园的离岸债券持有人选择柯克兰进行债务重组谈判 - 消息人士
item.description: A major group of Country Garden offshore creditors has appointed Kirkland & Ellis LLP as the legal adviser, a source familiar with the matter said, in a move towards discussing debt repayment options with the defaulted Chinese developer.翻译:一位知情人士称，碧桂园的一大海外债权人已任命凯易律师事务所为法律顾问，此举旨在与这家违约的中国开发商讨论债务偿还方案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 分析人士认为，俄罗斯燃料综合体在疑似无人机袭击后几周内恢复运营
item.description: Russian energy company Novatek is likely to resume large-scale operations at its Ust-Luga processing complex and Baltic Sea terminal within weeks, after a fire started by what Ukrainian media said was a drone attack, analysts said on Monday.翻译:分析人士周一表示，在乌克兰媒体称无人机袭击引发火灾后，俄罗斯能源公司诺瓦泰克可能会在几周内恢复其乌斯季卢加加工中心和波罗的海码头的大规模运营。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾12月出口订单创六个月来最严重跌幅，前景不佳
item.description: Taiwan's export orders fell more than expected in their worst performance in six months in December, with the outlook for the island's high-tech products remaining poor due to growing doubts about global economic growth.翻译:台湾12月份出口订单降幅超出预期，创六个月来最差表现，由于对全球经济增长的疑虑日益加剧，台湾高科技产品的前景仍然不佳。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：随着股市暴跌，中国采取行动支持人民币
item.description: China's major state-owned banks moved to support the yuan on Monday, tightening liquidity in the offshore foreign exchange market while actively selling U.S. dollars onshore as equities slid, four sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:四位知情人士称，中国主要国有银行周一采取行动支持人民币，收紧离岸外汇市场的流动性，同时随着股市下跌，在岸积极抛售美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在对限制查阅裁决的计划提出强烈抗议后，中国誓言司法披露
item.description: China's top court has pledged to "deepen judicial disclosure" after its plan to curtail access to court decisions faced unusual public criticism from lawyers and legal experts.翻译:在限制查阅法院判决的计划遭到律师和法律专家不同寻常的公开批评后，中国最高法院承诺“深化司法公开”。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 诺瓦泰克的乌斯季卢加波罗的海燃料综合设施受到攻击
item.description: Russian energy company Novatek on Sunday was forced to suspend some operations at Ust-Luga, a huge Baltic Sea fuel export terminal and processing complex, due to a fire started by what Ukrainian media said was a drone attack.翻译:俄罗斯能源公司诺瓦泰克 (Novatek) 周日被迫暂停乌斯季卢加 (Ust-Luga) 的部分业务，乌斯季卢加是波罗的海的一个大型燃料出口码头和加工中心，原因是乌克兰媒体称是无人机袭击引发的火灾。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲足球周
item.description: Talking points from the week in Asian football:翻译:本周亚洲足球的谈话要点：
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 早盘竞价：日经指数期待日本央行保持放松
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾谴责中国海警对菲律宾渔民的“挑衅行动”
item.description: The Philippines condemns the latest "provocative action" by Chinese coastguard against Filipino fishermen, the spokesperson of the National Security Council said on Monday.翻译:国家安全委员会发言人周一表示，菲律宾谴责中国海警对菲律宾渔民的最新“挑衅行动”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国新疆南部发生里氏5.1级地震 - GFZ
item.description: A magnitude 5.1 earthquake struck southern Xinjiang, China on Monday, the German Research Centre for Geosciences (GFZ)said.翻译:德国地球科学研究中心（GFZ）表示，周一，中国新疆南部发生了 5.1 级地震。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国山体滑坡已造成八人死亡、数十人失踪
item.description: A landslide in China's Yunnan province killed eight people on Monday and dozens were missing as rescue operations continued in snowy, freezing temperatures.翻译:周一，中国云南省发生山体滑坡，造成八人死亡，数十人失踪，救援行动在冰天雪地中继续进行。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称又发现六个中国热气球，其中一个飞越岛屿
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it had detected six more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has seen over the past month-and-a-half.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周日又发现六个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越台湾岛，这是该部称在过去一个半月里看到的一系列此类气球中的最新一起。 。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在人民币面临压力的情况下，中国保持基准贷款利率稳定
item.description: China kept benchmark lending rates unchanged at their monthly fixing on Monday, matching expectations with Beijing seen as having limited scope for monetary easing amid downward pressure on the yuan.翻译:周一，中国维持基准贷款利率不变，符合人民币贬值压力下货币宽松空间有限的预期。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 世界股市延续涨势，各国央行按兵不动
item.description: AI helped the tech sector ahead of a week of central-bank meetings, economic data and corporate earnings.翻译:在一周的央行会议、经济数据和企业盈利之前，人工智能为科技行业提供了帮助。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie, Wayne Cole

item.title: 中国不顾制裁让俄罗斯在2023年成为最大石油供应国
item.description: Russia leapfrogged Saudi Arabia to become China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, data showed on Saturday, as the world's biggest crude importer defied Western sanctions to purchase vast quantities of discounted oil for its processing plants.翻译:周六的数据显示，俄罗斯将在 2023 年超越沙特阿拉伯，成为中国最大的原油供应国，因为全球最大的原油进口国不顾西方制裁，为其加工厂购买大量折扣石油。
item.author: Andrew Hayley

item.title: 欧洲、非洲原油市场因红海中断和中国需求而收紧
item.description: The Brent crude market structure and some physical markets in Europe and Africa are reflecting tighter supply resulting partly from concern about shipping delays due to vessels avoiding the Red Sea, according to traders, LSEG data and analysts.翻译:交易商、伦敦证交所数据和分析师称，布伦特原油市场结构以及欧洲和非洲的一些现货市场反映出供应紧张，部分原因是担心船只避开红海而造成运输延误。
item.author: Alex Lawler, Robert Harvey, Natalie Grover
